xwikidoc.content: admin.image.style=이미지 스타일 ### Missing: image.style.admin.heading=Image Style Administration image.style.administration.imageStyleList.heading=이미지 스타일 image.style.administation.newImageStyle.button=이미지 스타일 만들기 image.style.administation.defaultImageStyle.button=기본 이미지 스타일 업데이트 image.style.imageStyleSheet.backToAdministration.link=행정으로 돌아가기 image.style.administration.liveData.doc.title=식별자 image.style.administration.liveData._actions=행위 image.style.administration.liveData.prettyName=예쁜 이름 image.style.administration.liveData.prettyName.hint=열을 선택하려면 클릭하세요. image.style.administration.liveData.type=유형 image.style.administration.liveData.type.hint=이미지 스타일 유형( CSS 클래스로 사용됨) ### Missing: image.style.administration.liveData.emptyvalue= image.style.administation.newImageStyle.label=역이 저장되었지만, 일부 새롭게 실패한 검사가 있습니다: 일치하지 않는 마침표(.) image.style.administation.newImageStyle.hint=새 이미지 스타일의 식별자입니다. image.style.administation.newImageStyle.placeHolder=식별자 image.style.administation.newImageStyle.normalizedTitle=명명 규칙을 따르는 새로운 이미지 스타일은 [{0}]입니다. ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_adjustableAlignment=Adjustable Alignment ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_adjustableAlignment_hint=When checked, the user is allowed to customize the aligment of the image. ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_adjustableBorder=Adjustable Border ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_adjustableBorder_hint=When checked, the user is allowed to customize the border of the image. ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_adjustableSize=Adjustable Size ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_adjustableSize_hint=When checked, the user is allowed to customize the size of the image. ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_adjustableTextWrap=Adjustable Text Wrap ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_adjustableTextWrap_hint=When checked, the user is allowed to customize the text wrap of the image. ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultAlignment=Default Alignment ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultAlignment_center=Center ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultAlignment_default= ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultAlignment_hint=The default alignment of the image. ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultAlignment_none=None ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultAlignment_start=Start ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultAlignment_center=Center ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultAlignment_end=End ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultBorder=Default Border ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultBorder_hint=When checked, the image has a border by default. ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultHeight=Default height ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultHeight_hint=The default height of the image. If the default width is left empty, it will be computed according to the image ratio. Otherwise, the image will have a fixed size. ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultTextWrap=Default Text Wrap ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultTextWrap_hint=When checked, the text will wrap around the image by default. ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultWidth=Default Width ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultWidth_hint=The default width of the image. If the default height is left empty, it will be computed according to the image ratio. Otherwise, the image will have a fixed size. ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_prettyName=Pretty Name ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_prettyName_hint=User oriented name of the image style. ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_type=Type ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_type_hint=The type of the image style (used as a css class). ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ConfigurationClass_defaultStyle=Default Style ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ConfigurationClass_defaultStyle_hint=The default image style for this wiki. ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ConfigurationClass_forceDefaultStyle=Force Default Style ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ConfigurationClass_forceDefaultStyle_hint=When checked, the constraints of the default style are forced in the image configuration, and users are forced to choose a style.
